description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).

targets.expr: irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[1m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[1m])

sum by(method,uri) (http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance"}) / sum by(method,uri) (http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance"})

title: Spring Boot Statistics
